stanza.line: Against that time (if ever that time come)come)
When I shall see thee frown on my defectsdefects
When as thy love hath cast his utmost sumsum
Called to that audit by advised respectsrespects
Against that time when thou shalt strangely passpass
And scarcely greet me with that sun thine eyeeye
When love converted from the thing it waswas
Shall reasons find of settled gravitygravity
Against that time do I ensconce me herehere
Within the knowledge of mine own desertdesert
And this my hand against my self uprearuprear
To guard the lawful reasons on thy partpart
To leave poor me thou hast the strength of lawslaws
Since why to love I can allege no causecause
